Name: Cicada Cocktail
Ingredients: 10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with dusting of nutmeg grated over cocktail.
Review: Smoothed whiskey with more than a hint of almond.
History: Those familiar with the Grasshopper cocktail (named for its green colour) will understand why this one is called the Cicada (they're a bit browner).
Nutrition: One serving of Cicada Cocktail contains 324 calories
